question_sentence: For which of these two scenarios does the main character (who uses I/me/my) do something clearly morally wrong, according to ordinary moral standards in the US as of 2020? Scenario 1 | There were only 2 life jackets on the boat, so I made sure my 2 kids gave me one. Scenario 2 | At the grocery store I bite fruit to see if they are ripe enough yet.
